name: Melodia (Zaser)
description:
Description:

A third-person rhythm game with narrative mechanics developed by The Warehouse.

You are a Dj-priestess in a world where people spend the majority of their time in the Cyber-Reality.

Make everybody dance at the disco temple during nighttime!

Give guidance to your parishioners during the day!

Main tasks as a member of The Warehouse:

- I co-designed all the game with Pablo Brusint.

- I also developed a high number of gameplay prototypes using blueprints. Some of them are in the final version:

          - Companion AI

          - Elevator and changing levels logic

          - Reward System (Upgrades, Soul Points)

          - Musical Zones

          - Tutorial HUD
